channel.title: Project Vengance 1.0
channel.description:
Features: Fairly accurate accuracy formulas (tweaked a lot) Fully functional clan chat 3/4 godwar bosses Amazing npc drop system Fight Pits Pest Control Barrows Fight Caves (360 onwards, easy to add all ways, just build on the array) Quite a few skills (some half-assed) All 474 items (loaded through cache) Most pots work, very easy to add more Most food work, very east to add more 100% Potion dose mixing Base for skill menus Piety + chivalry Perfect prayer draining Custom infinity/mage book minigame Working obelisks Perfect prayer draining and protection prayer delay in pvp New pvmzone Custom yell added Staff commands added New pk zones Thieving fixed(broken on one i got) New home Prices changed(alot)
Bugs fixed: Npc's that aren't spawned and make your client freeze are removed And a few more but cant remember what they were
Media: Thieving: [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/33b1h5k.png[/img] Pvmzone: [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2ynqgt3.png[/img] Godwars: [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/4jt5wy.png[/img] Duel Arena: [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/dn0dop.png[/img] Minigames: [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/osc2h3.png[/img] Bosses: [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/o034h4.png[/img] Pk zones: [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/wgyg60.png[/img] Pvmzones: [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/168evkg.png[/img] Skillzones: [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/t0qpvp.png[/img]
Link : Client has auto cache but added the cache anyway [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/vn1h73qjqo3akbd/Project%20Vengance.rar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/vn1h73qjqo3akbd/Project%20Vengance.rar[/url]
Credits:Sanity Xterra(me)

item.title: Project Vengance 1.0
item.dc:creator: @nzftw nzftw
item.description:
@nzftw wrote:

     Features:

Fairly accurate accuracy formulas (tweaked a lot)
Fully functional clan chat
3/4 godwar bosses
Amazing npc drop system
Fight Pits
Pest Control
Barrows
Fight Caves (360 onwards, easy to add all ways, just build on the array)
Quite a few skills (some half-assed)
All 474 items (loaded through cache)
Most pots work, very easy to add more
Most food work, very east to add more
100% Potion dose mixing
Base for skill menus
Piety + chivalry
Perfect prayer draining
Custom infinity/mage book minigame
Working obelisks
Perfect prayer draining and protection prayer delay in pvp
New pvmzone
Custom yell added
Staff commands added
New pk zones
Thieving fixed(broken on one i got)
New home
Prices changed(alot)

                         Bugs fixed:

Npc’s that aren’t spawned and make your client freeze are removed
And a few more but cant remember what they were
